question: Write at least 150 words. You have seen a job advertised in the newspaper. You want toapply for the job.Write a letter to the manager of the company.In your letter• provide information about yourself• give details of your previous work experience• Say why the company should consider you for the job You do NOT need to write anyaddresses. Begin your letter as follows:Dear Sir,
text: I am Kan Patel, I recently came over through your job advertisement in the newspaper. I am writing you this as I am interested in your job.

The team is looking for the post of assistant supervisor in the IT department. I worked as a team leader in XZ IT group for over three years. I have been working with web development, software testing, and graphics designing for a long period of time. I have also attended international meetings with my previous company. If your company gives me one chance, definitely I will be an asset to your company. You can contact me either by my mobile phone at 1234567890 or by email. And my email is [email protected]

I am attaching some of my great work below. So that you can come to know about my skills in the information and technology department. Furthermore, I am doing master's in information and technology from one of the best colleges in Canada.
I am waiting for your positive reply. I hope you will reply to me as soon as possible.
